attributes.action: not pay minimum wage to those that serve in the army
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be unreasonable to pay the number of hours in service for armed force personnel as it is like most other jobs, particularly those in the public sector a salary numerated position so therefore it is unfeasible to offer an hourly rate in the light of a job requiring a certain number of hours that is clearly open to the flexibility of the worker - moreover, the working conditions are clear at the time of entry when that personnel member is hired.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
